ygData.subject: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello.  I am getting a new computer in a week and the first thing I going to do is to buy EverQuest.  I have my heart set on playing as a Dark Elf Shadow
ygData.messageBody:
Hello. I am getting a new computer in a week and the
first thing I going to do is to buy EverQuest. I have
my heart set on playing as a Dark Elf Shadow Knight
because they're the coolest. I would like to know if
this would be extremely different to do, especcially
for a newbie. I do know a lot about the game though
because my friend has it. If anyone wants to tell me
anything about the dark elf sk please do so. I'll see
you all on the Tunare server in about a week or so.

Tekman (future Dark Elf Sk on Tunare)
